name: Security Detections
description: Aggregated detection rule database — Sigma, Splunk ESCU, Elastic, KQL rules with MITRE ATT&CK mappings

tools: search_rules — Search detection rules by keyword or MITRE technique
get_rule — Get full rule details (logic, references, severity)
list_by_technique — List rules for a specific ATT&CK technique
list_by_cve — List rules that detect exploitation of a CVE
translate_rule — Translate Sigma rule to target SIEM format

setup_steps: 2. No auth required — rules are pulled from public repositories
3. Database updates on each startup (or periodically)
4. No network access needed after initial download
security_notes: Completely offline after initial setup — no API keys, no external calls
Rules are from public sources (Sigma, ESCU, Elastic)
Zero risk surface — read-only local database
Perfect starting MCP for security teams evaluating MCP adoption
use_cases: Threat hunting — find Sigma rules for a TTP, translate to your SIEM's query language
Detection engineering — discover coverage gaps by MITRE technique
CVE response — find existing detection rules for newly disclosed CVEs
Knowledge base — AI can explain detection logic and suggest improvements
